titleStmt.title: A grand-fathers legacy; or Maltbey's morsels for mourners Diuided into seuerall meditations for euery day in the weeke. Being a comfort to all wounded and oppressed consciences, which seeke for comfort by the word of truth. By Iohn Maltbey late minister of Gods word at Buckland in Glocester-shire.
titleStmt.author: Maltbey, John.
Maltbey, Margaret.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. Okes [and J. Okes] and are to be sold [by S. Waterson] at the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Edited by the author's wife, Margaret Maltbey--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue.
Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
Page numbers 64-65 and 114-115 are omitted in page numbering.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
